nodes.text: Peawp R'dawc was a female Zabrak and combat expert who lived on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War.

By the time of the Battle of Yavin, Peawp R'dawc worked in Mos Eisley, under the orders of Mayor Mikdanyell Guh'rantt, and was tasked to take care of the thugs who preyed on the city. Circa 1 ABY, she managed to get an individual to deal with the problem. While affiliated with Jabba the Hutt's criminal organizarion, the spacer acted on behalf of the Mayor Mikdanyell Guh'rantt. The spacer ridded the outskirts of Mos Eisley from undesirable swoopers, scavengers, moisture thieves, gunrunners and malfunctioning battle droids. Peawp R'dawc eventually tasked the spacer to defeat Vaigon Shinn's muggers in their hideout.
The card "Moisture Thieves" of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game misspelled her name as "Peawp R'dwac."
